Text:
Whoever rated this +1 is brain dead. 

The audio is ahead of the video by more than one complete second. This trash of a torrent should be deleted as well as your "Trusted" status.

Check your work before you post such garbage. Waste of my time...
just an fyi:  I do check after I rip and it worked fine for me.  I don't know what your problem was.  You are the only one who has said anything, Einstein.

He's right. Audio is a full 1 second behind in the beginning and slowly becomes 1.5 seconds towards the end of the movie. The reason no one else has probably written is because they just deal with it in VLC and adjust audio or they don't want to register.
